channel.title: Quest tab open up bank
channel.description:
Have a little question to see if anyone can help me. Right so in my quest tab i want to make it so that when players click on something on it like "Open up bank" It'll open up the bank for them I was wondering what files i would go in to make this happen. I have already set up the shit in quest tab so it says "Open up bank" But i just need it to open the bank up!
Thanks a ton! Skype (GooniesHF)

item.title: Quest tab open up bank
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Monthly-, post:3, topic:547565”]Thanks man! But how would i find the case?
I click the thing in the quest tab and it doesn’t show a number in console or anything?[/quote]
Make it show the number then…
add code to make it “debug”.
Ex:
System.out.println("Button ID: " + actionButtonId);

That would print the actionButtonId every time the method is called.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab open up bank
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Depending on your server base, how it’s done may change.
Find where your server handles the clickingbuttons packet, in a 317 PI it’s ClickingButtons.java.
In there, there’s typically a switch statement for the button ids.
You would add a case to the statement for your button. Ex:

case 1234:
     c.getPA().openUpBank();
     break;

Now anytime you clicked a button with the id of 1234, it would run the openUpBank method.

This code won’t work directly for you, depending on your base. (you didn’t tell us much so…).

Read full topic
